articles.author: Robert Z. Pearlman
articles.title: From Earth orbit to the moon: Europe's I-Hab continues Spacelab 40-year legacy - Space.com
articles.description: Four decades after Europe's first pressurized space module lifted off into space, Spacelab is inspiring a new generation of lunar-based pressure vessels.
